long_description: Not much can ruin a good hangout session in your hammock, but the rain sure can dampen the mood. Keep annoying drips at bay with the ENO DripStrips. Tried and tested in the moist Pacific Northwest, acetal webbing DripStrips act as mini barriers to redirect rogue water streams down and away from your hammock. As simple as a place and clip, the DripStrips attach to any ENO hammock suspension system, and combined with an ENO rain tarp, will keep your hammock dry and your spirits high. ENO DripStrips are sold as a pair.
